channel.title: Changeing the player rights for TestScape?
channel.description: hi i was wondering how you change the player rights... to like make him a mod? i have some TestScape Source and how do i change my self to be an Admin/Player Mod/ Mod?

item.title: Changeing the player rights for TestScape?
item.dc:creator: @hmpph hmpph
item.description:
@hmpph wrote:

look in your client.java and search for “admin” you should then see a list of names underneath.
Change one of those names to Your desired username and viola you should be an admin. Also you should get a better source like chezscape as its easier to change player rights there.

Read full topic

item.title: Changeing the player rights for TestScape?
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

In testscape u cant change it in character files.
U have to go to client.java search for admin list and add their name in with desired rights levels.

Read full topic
item.source: Changeing the player rights for TestScape?

item.title: Changeing the player rights for TestScape?
item.dc:creator: @hmpph hmpph
item.description:
@hmpph wrote:

Open up your source,
Open up you character file,
Open up the .txt that has the name of the player you want to mod,
Scroll down to where you see “character-rights = 0”
And change the 0 to either 1 for mod
2 for admin
or 3 for owner

Also there is a TuT on this, if you want it in even more detail
{which Can’t get even more simpler then that}
Just search for it in the Tutourial list

Read full topic
